content: Happy Pizza Day All!A celebration of said day and my way of saying Thanks, again.  Winner will receive items as pictured.  Don't be afraid to merit.  Free shipping to US address, if international address, will ship to minerjones and you must arrange reshipping with him.  No new accounts created today and afterwards qualify for this entry. Please no alts that will result in multiple entries.  How this will work:Pick a table and a slot.  I will select a block and last character will select the table.  If last character doesn't result in a table selection, then block(s) will be selected until so.  Once table has been determined, I will select another block and the last character will determine the winner.Table 30 -  Steeley1 -  Saxoshi2 -  GazetaBitcoin3 -  inthelongrun4 -  Darker455 -  tweetious6 -  -doubleU-7 -  doblezero8 -  Abiky9 -  bitdextera -  digicoinuserb -  YodasRedRocketc -  Spokanistan51d -  Dernostee -  willi9974f -   thiago007Table 60 -  PawGo 1 -  Otillio13302 -  ChiBitCTy3 -  Fattcatt4 -  bitbollo5 -  5tift6 -  slimzak7 -  krogoth8 -  heisty9 -  Hookzup1a -  aoluainb -  icopressc -  MoparMiningLLCd -  tread93e -  DireWolfM14f -  haloxonTable 90 -  sam001 -  Boristhecat2 -  PeakDK3 -  Danydee4 -  geophphreigh5 -  Markzellers 6 -  NeuroticFish 7 -  Cryptogreatdane8 -  JUSTDLISK9 -  Remsjacka -  Suzuki Mattb -  ragilabc -  Bitcoins101d -  JanEmile -  The_Crypto_Kidf -  cygan
